trans-unit.source: Provides numerous conversion functions and exposes a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
This class provides numerous conversion functions and also exposes a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
Note that when rendering as Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), use of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object for custom drawing will not be included as part of the SVG document.
Note also that, by default, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> functions usually take absolute coordinates.
Therefore the conversion methods of this class should be useful if you perform drawing operations.

A <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartGraphics> object is exposed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> class?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, which makes it easy to perform custom drawing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> events.
If significant changes are made to the default behavior of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, the chart image and its associated elements may be drawn erratically.
For example, positioning may be altered.
It is highly recommended that you become well acquainted with GDI+ before you make any significant changes to the properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
`True` to release both unmanaged and managed resources; `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object and converts its relative coordinates to absolute coordinates.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object and converts its relative coordinates to absolute coordinates.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses absolute coordinates.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
Takes a given axis value for a specified axis and returns the relative pixel value.
Chart area name.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName"></xref> enumeration value that identifies the relevant axis.
The axis value to be converted to a relative pixel value.
A `string` value that represents the converted axis value, in relative pixel coordinates.
Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that uses absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that is using absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure in absolute coordinates.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure in relative coordinates.
Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
Gets or sets a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that can be used for drawing purposes.
You can use this object property to perform any custom drawing that can be performed using GDI+.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used for drawing.
